amendatorysection.catchline: Diverting designated livestock; removing or altering identification; violations; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Whenever, in accordance with the provisions of sections 54-1367 to 54-1384, livestock are required or designated to move to a particular destination, it shall be unlawful to divert the livestock from such destination without having first obtained permission from the department. Any person unlawfully diverting livestock or directly or indirectly removing or altering the identification of livestock to be so moved shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.
